mapper.select: select id,StringV,dateV from testTable where flag='0' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update testTable d set d.StringV=#{StringV} where d.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,item_id itemId,site_id siteId from public_data_dict where item_type='category' and item_id not in (select DISTINCT public_data_dict.item_parent_id from public_data_dict where item_type='category') and item_id not IN (select DISTINCT public_data_dict.item_parent_id from public_data_dict where item_type='categorySpecifics') and site_id = #{siteID}
